data.text: Muganzi wange aserengese mu nnimiro ye,
Muganzi wange, wange, nange ndi wuwe;
Oli mubalagavu nga Tiruza,6:4 Tiruza kyali kibuga kya dda mu Kanani ekyalondebwa Yerobowaamu mu 930-909 bc okuba ekibuga ekikulu eky’Obwakabaka bw’omu Bukiikakkono
Ne bwe walibeerawo bakabaka abakazi nkaaga,
ejjiba lyange, owange ataliiko bbala, ow’enjawulo,
Naserengeta mu nnimiro ey’emiti egy’ensigo okwetegereza
